00016       function    _std_error_message( $ErrorMessage )
00017       {
00018             try
00019             {
00020                   $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00021                   if( $ErrorMessage !== '' )
00022                   {
00023                         $PageComposer->add_error_message( $ErrorMessage );
00024                   }
00025                   else
00026                   {
00027                         $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'an_error_occured' );
00028                   }
00029             }
00030             catch( Exception $e )
00031             {
00032                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00033             }
00034       }

00222             function                get_section( $SectionName )
00223             {
00224                   try
00225                   {
00226                         if( isset( $this->Config[ $SectionName ] ) )
00227                         {
00228                               return( $this->Config[ $SectionName ] );
00229                         }
00230                         else
00231                         {
00232                               throw( 
00233                                     new Exception( "Section \"$SectionName\" was not found in config ".serialize( $this->Config ) )

00266             {
00267                   try
00268                   {
00269                         if( $this->Config === false )
00270                         {
00271                               throw( new Exception( 'Config was not set' ) );

00273                         return( isset( $this->Config[ $SectionName ] ) );
00274                   }
00275                   catch( Exception $e )
00276                   {
00277                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00303             function                custom_validation_login_exists( $Pair )
00304             {
00305                   try
00306                   {
00307                         $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00308                         
00309                         $Result =  $UserAlgorithms->user_exists( $this->Security->get_gp( $Pair[ 1 ] , 'string' ) );
00310                         
00311                         if( $Result === false )
00312                         {
00313                               $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_does_not_exist' );
00314                         }
00315                         
00316                         return( $Result );
00317                   }
00318                   catch( Exception $e )
00319                   {
00320                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00321                   }
00322             }

00472             {

00519             function                custom_validation( $ValidationScript , $Options )
00520             {
00521                   try
00522                   {
00523                         $ValidationScript = explode( ";" , $ValidationScript );
00524                         
00525                         foreach( $ValidationScript as $vs )
00526                         {
00527                               $Pair = explode( ":" , $vs );
00528                               
00529                               switch( $Pair[ 0 ] )
00530                               {
00531                                     case( 'login_exists' ):return( $this->custom_validation_login_exists( $Pair ) );
00532                                     case( 'login_does_not_exist' ):return( $this->custom_validation_login_does_not_exist( $Pair ) );
00533                                     case( 'page_exists' ):return( $this->custom_validation_page_exists( $Pair ) );
00534                                     case( 'page_does_not_exist' ):return( $this->custom_validation_page_does_not_exist( $Pair ) );
00535                                     case( 'captcha' ):return( $this->custom_validation_captcha( $Pair ) );
00536                                     
00537                                     default:throw( new Exception( 'Undefined predicate '.$Pair[ 0 ] ) );
00538                               }
00539                         }
00540                         
00541                         return( true );
00542                   }
00543                   catch( Exception $e )
00544                   {
00545                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00546                   }
00547             }

00571             function                process_call_params_filter( $Options )
00572             {
00573                   try
00574                   {
00575                         if( $this->section_exists( 'call_params_filter' ) )
00576                         {
00577                               $CallParamsFilter = $this->get_section( 'call_params_filter' );
00578                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:call_params_filter} : $CallParamsFilter" , COMMON );
00579                               if( $this->Security->validate_custom_fields( $Options->get_raw_settings() , 
00580                                                                                                                                     $CallParamsFilter ) === false )
00581                               {
00582                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
00583                                           "{lang:call_params_filter_not_passed} : $CallParamsFilter" , COMMON
00584                                     );
00585                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00586                                     return( false );
00587                               }
00588                         }
00589                         
00590                         return( true );
00591                   }
00592                   catch( Exception $e )
00593                   {
00594                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00595                   }
00596             }

00620             function                process_get_post_filter( $Options )
00621             {
00622                   try
00623                   {
00624                         if( $this->section_exists( 'get_post_filter' ) )
00625                         {
00626                               $GetPostFilter = $this->get_section( 'get_post_filter' );
00627                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:get_post_filter} : $GetPostFilter" , COMMON );
00628                               if( $this->Security->validate_fields( $GetPostFilter ) === false )
00629                               {
00630                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:get_post_filter_not_passed} : $GetPostFilter" , COMMON );
00631                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "GET  : ".serialize( $_GET ) , COMMON );
00632                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "POST : ".serialize( $_POST ) , COMMON );
00633                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00634                                     return( false );
00635                               }
00636                         }
00637 
00638                         return( true );
00639                   }
00640                   catch( Exception $e )
00641                   {
00642                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00643                   }
00644             }

00668             function                process_permits_filter( $Options )
00669             {
00670                   try
00671                   {
00672                         if( $this->section_exists( 'permits_filter' ) )
00673                         {
00674                               $Filter = $this->get_section( 'permits_filter' );
00675                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:permits_filter} : $Filter" , COMMON );
00676 
00677                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_all_permits( false , 'user' , $Filter ) === false )
00678                               {
00679                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:permits_filter_not_passed} : $Filter" , COMMON );
00680                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00681                                     return( false );
00682                               }
00683                         }
00684 
00685                         return( true );
00686                   }
00687                   catch( Exception $e )
00688                   {
00689                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00715             function                process_permits_validation( $Options )
00716             {
00717                   try
00718                   {
00719                         if( $this->section_exists( 'permits_validation' ) )
00720                         {
00721                               $Validation = $this->get_section( 'permits_validation' );
00722                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:permits_validation} : $Validation" , COMMON );
00723 
00724                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_all_permits( false , 'user' , $Validation ) === false )
00725                               {
00726                                     $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( 'no_permits' );
00727                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
00728                                           "{lang:permits_validation_not_passed} : $Validation" , COMMON
00729                                     );
00730                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "GET  : ".serialize( $_GET ) , COMMON );
00731                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "POST : ".serialize( $_POST ) , COMMON );
00732                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00733                                     return( false );
00734                               }
00735                         }
00736 
00737                         return( true );
00738                   }
00739                   catch( Exception $e )
00740                   {

00742                   }

00767             function                process_custom_validation( $Options )
00768             {
00769                   try
00770                   {
00771                         if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation' ) )
00772                         {
00773                               $CustomValidation = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation' );
00774                               
00775                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:custom_validation} : $CustomValidation" , COMMON );
00776                               
00777                               if( $this->custom_validation( $CustomValidation , $Options ) === false )
00778                               {
00779                                     $TraceString = "{lang:custom_validation_not_passed} : $GetPostValidation";
00780                                     
00781                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( $TraceString , COMMON );
00782                                     
00783                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00784                                     
00785                                     return( false );
00786                               }
00787                         }
00788 
00789                         return( true );
00790                   }
00791                   catch( Exception $e )
00792                   {
00793                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00794                   }

00819             function                process_custom_validation_func( $Options )
00820             {
00821                   try
00822                   {
00823                         if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_func' ) )
00824                         {
00825                               if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_package_name' ) )
00826                               {
00827                                     if( $this->section_exists( 'custom_validation_package_version' ) )
00828                                     {
00829                                           $Version = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_package_version' );
00830                                     }
00831                                     else
00832                                     {
00833                                           $Version = 'last';
00834                                     }
00835                                     
00836                                     $PackageName = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_package_name' );
00837                                     
00838                                     $ValidationObject = get_package( $PackageName , $Version , __FILE__ );
00839                               }
00840                               else
00841                               {
00842                                     $ValidationObject = $Owner;
00843                               }
00844 
00845                               $CustomValidationFunc = $this->get_section( 'custom_validation_func' );
00846                               
00847                               if( call_user_func( array( $ValidationObject , $CustomValidationFunc ) , $Options ) === false )
00848                               {
00849                                     $TraceString = "{lang:custom_validation_func_not_passed} : $CustomValidationFunc";
00850                                     
00851                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( $TraceString , COMMON );
00852                                     
00853                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
00854                                     
00855                                     return( false );
00856                               }
00857                         }
00858 
00859                         return( true );
00860                   }
00861                   catch( Exception $e )
00862                   {
00863                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00864                   }
00865             }

00881             function                process_success_messages()
00882             {
00883                   try
00884                   {
00885                         if( $this->section_exists( 'success_message' ) )
00886                         {
00887                               if( $this->Security->get_s( 'direct_controller' , 'integer' , 0 ) === 0 )
00888                               {
00889                                     $SuccessMessage = $this->get_section( 'success_message' );
00890                                     $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00891                                     
00892                                     $this->Security->reset_s( "$PageName:success_message" , $SuccessMessage );
00893                               }
00894                               
00895                               $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( $this->get_section( 'success_message' ) );
00896                         }
00897                         
00898                         if( $this->section_exists( 'global_success_message' ) )
00899                         {
00900                               $SuccessMessage = $this->get_section( 'global_success_message' );
00901                               
00902                               if( $this->Security->get_s( 'direct_controller' , 'integer' , 0 ) === 0 )
00903                               {
00904                                     $this->Security->reset_s( 'success_message' , $SuccessMessage );
00905                               }
00906                               
00907                               $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( $SuccessMessage );
00908                         }
00909                   }
00910                   catch( Exception $e )
00911                   {
00912                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00913                   }
00914             }
00915             
00942             function                execute( $Options , $Owner )
00943             {
00944                   try
00945                   {
00946                         $this->Trace->start_group( "Context::execute for class \"".get_class( $Owner )."\"" );
00947 
00948                         if( $this->process_call_params_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00949                         
00950                         if( $this->process_get_post_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00951                         
00952                         if( $this->process_permits_filter( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00953                         
00954                         if( $this->process_permits_validation( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00955                         
00958                         if( $this->section_exists( 'get_post_validation' ) )
00959                         {
00960                               $GetPostValidation = $this->get_section( 'get_post_validation' );
00961                         }
00962 
00963                         if( $this->section_exists( 'get_post_validation' ) === false || 
00964                               $this->Security->validate_fields( $GetPostValidation ) === true )
00965                         {
00966                               if( $this->process_custom_validation( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00967 
00968                               if( $this->process_custom_validation_func( $Options ) === false )return( false );
00969                         
00972                               $FuncName = $this->get_section( 'success_func' );
00973                               
00974                               if( $FuncName === '_std_redirect' )
00975                               {
00976                                     $RedirectUrl = $this->get_section( 'redirect_url' );
00977                                     
00978                                     $FunctionBody = 'return( _std_redirect( "'.$RedirectUrl.'" , $OwnerObject ) );';
00979                                     
00980                                     $NewFunc = create_function( '$OwnerObject' , $FunctionBody );
00981                                     
00982                                     $NewFunc( $Owner );
00983                               }
00984                               else
00985                               {
00986                                     if( method_exists( $Owner , $FuncName ) === false )
00987                                     {
00988                                           throw( 
00989                                                 new Exception( "Method \"$FuncName\" was not found in class ".get_class( $Owner ) )
00990                                           );
00991                                     }
00992                                     
00993                                     $FunctionBody = 'return( $OwnerObject->'.$FuncName.'( $Options ) );';
00994                                     $NewFunc = create_function( '$OwnerObject , $Options' , $FunctionBody );
00995                                     
00996                                     if( $NewFunc( $Owner , $Options ) !== false )
00997                                     {
00998                                           if( $this->section_exists( 'cleanup_fields' ) )
00999                                           {
01000                                                 $Items = explode( ',' , $this->get_section( 'cleanup_fields' ) );
01001                                                 foreach( $Items as $key => $value )
01002                                                 {
01003                                                       $this->Security->reset_p( $value , '' );
01004                                                 }
01005                                           }
01006                                     }
01007                               }
01008                               
01009                               $this->process_success_messages();
01010                         }
01011                         else
01012                         {
01015                               if( $this->section_exists( 'error_func' ) )
01016                               {
01017                                     $FuncName = $this->get_section( 'error_func' );
01018                                     $NewFunc = create_function( 
01019                                           '$OwnerObject , $Options' , 'return( $Owner->'.$FuncName.'( $Options ) );'
01020                                     );
01021                                     $NewFunc( $Owner , $Options );
01022                               }
01023                               else
01024                               {
01025                                     $NewFunc = create_function( 
01026                                           '$OwnerObject' , 'return( _std_error_message( "'.$this->Security->ErrorMessage.'" ) );'
01027                                     );
01028                                     $NewFunc( $Owner );
01029                                     $this->Trace->add_trace_string( 
01030                                           "{lang:_std_error_message} : ".$this->Security->ErrorMessage , COMMON
01031                                     );
01032                                     $this->Trace->end_group();
01033                                     
01034                                     return( false );
01035                               }
01036                         }
01037                         
01038                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:state_was_processed}" , COMMON );
01039                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01040                         return( true );
01041                   }
01042                   catch( Exception $e )
01043                   {
01044                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01045                   }
01046             }
01047             
01066             function                __toString()
01067             {
01068                   try
01069                   {
01070                         return( serialize( $this->Config ) );
01071                   }
01072                   catch( Exception $e )
01073                   {
01074                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01075                   }
